td.content: s:pt presents with critical pain radiating from the back to the torso, critical lower extremity weakness and numbness, critical urinary incontinence and Body Aches for 2 weeks. she has a history of Low Back Pain for past 1 year. she is a white f aged 44 yrs. Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol she denies smoking o:Height 166 cm, Weight 49.1 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15, Neuro = 5/5 strength U/E, 4/5 strength L/E, five beat clonus and upgoing toes B/L, light touch sensation diminished in both legs, upto midabdominal level a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to rheumatology.

s:a 44 YO white female blacksmith presents with critical urinary incontinence x 9 days. patient also complains of critical lower extremity weakness and numbness, critical pain radiating from the back to the torso, Body Aches. denies any alcohol use she denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 166 cm, Weight 49.6 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15, patient appears in severe distress a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Dexamethasone - 10 MG/ML IV bolus, and ordered Discectomy - L4, L5.

td.content: s:patient presents with 3 years history of critical urinary incontinence, critical lower extremity weakness and numbness, critical pain radiating from the back to the torso and Body Aches. she is a 46 yr old white female blacksmith. Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol denies any smoking o:Height 167 cm, Weight 51.2 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 18, CBC WBC=20000 /mm3,Hgb= 12 mg/dL,Hct=30 %,PLT=132000 /ml, MRI spine shows destruction and collapse of T6 vertebra, patient appears in severe distress a:Low Back Pain p:administered Dexamethasone - 10 MG/ML IV bolus, performed CBC, MRI spine, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
